Topic.Title: How to search for specific Line and Column to fix coding error?

Posts.EditableText:
Error running script: Error compiling expression 'Hit the wall.': SyntaxError: Unexpected end of fileLine: 1, Column: 38

I don't know how to find this specific spot as there is no identifiable how to search the grid
Posts.HTML:
Error running script: Error compiling expression 'Hit the wall.': SyntaxError: Unexpected end of fileLine: 1, Column: 38

I don't know how to find this specific spot as there is no identifiable how to search the grid

Posts.EditableText: Search for "Hit the wall" in the CodeView view. It sounds like a problem with acommand.
Posts.HTML: Search for "Hit the wall" in the CodeView view. It sounds like a problem with acommand.

Posts.EditableText: The line and column numbers are relative to the current execution pointer, so aren't useful. Searching for the code that has the error (as Pertex suggested) is a better approach.
Posts.HTML: The line and column numbers are relative to the current execution pointer, so aren't useful. Searching for the code that has the error (as Pertex suggested) is a better approach.
